Area of interest


Single Page Web Applications - are Web apps that load a single HTML page and dynamically update that page as the user interacts with the app (using JavasScript OOP, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3).
Responsive Web Design (RWD) - the concept of developing a website design in a manner that helps the layout to get changed according to the user’s computer screen resolution: mobile phone, tablet or desktop.
Modularity - modules are abstractions to make software easier to write and to maintain. AngularJS provides Model View Controller (MVC) architecture. Sass is a great tool to generate one CSS file. RequireJS.
Optimization - join all JavaScript files into one via r.js tool.
